languages.text: {n}Застывший и не смеющий поднести руки к пылающему лицу воин выдавливает мертвенное:{/n} "Слушаюсь".
{n}The enforcer freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Застывший и не смеющий поднести руки к пылающему лицу воин выдавливает мертвенное:{/n} "Слушаюсь".

traits.locale_text: {n}The soldier freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Will do."
{n}The soldier freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Will do."
{n}The enforcer freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain."

{n}The enforcer freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain."
{n}The enforcer freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}El guardia se queda inmóvil, sin osar llevarse las manos a su rostro rojo intenso, y responde con tono apagado:{/n} «Sí, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcer freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}El guardia se queda inmóvil, sin osar llevarse las manos a su rostro rojo intenso, y responde con tono apagado:{/n} «Sí, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}エンフォーサーがその場で凍り付く。赤く染まった顔に手を上げることすらできず、生気のない声を絞り出す。{/n}「かしこまりました、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcer freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}エンフォーサーがその場で凍り付く。赤く染まった顔に手を上げることすらできず、生気のない声を絞り出す。{/n}「かしこまりました、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: {n}执法者僵在原地，不敢用手去摸被打红的脸。他努力从嘴里挤出了毫无生气的话语。{/n}“遵命，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcer freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}执法者僵在原地，不敢用手去摸被打红的脸。他努力从嘴里挤出了毫无生气的话语。{/n}“遵命，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}Der Enforcer erstarrt, wagt es nicht, sein hochrotes Gesicht mit den Händen zu bedecken, und stammelt wie leblos:{/n} "Jawohl, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcer freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Enforcer erstarrt, wagt es nicht, sein hochrotes Gesicht mit den Händen zu bedecken, und stammelt wie leblos:{/n} "Jawohl, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Le prévôt se fige, luttant visiblement pour ne pas dissimuler son visage écarlate derrière ses mains, avant de laisser échapper un :{/n} « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcer freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prévôt se fige, luttant visiblement pour ne pas dissimuler son visage écarlate derrière ses mains, avant de laisser échapper un :{/n} « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}İnfazcı, olduğu yerde donakalıyor. Ellerini öfkeden kızarmış yüzüne getirmeye cüret bile edemiyor. Ardından ölü gibi bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Başüstüne Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcer freezes in place, not daring to raise his hands to his red-hot face, and squeezes out a lifeless{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain."
